title: Catchment Boards at work: Nelson
creator_credit: Apex Films and New Zealand National Film Unit
brief_description: How cultivation of the Nelson Province is being extended by scientific treatment of the soil; also, how further erosion is being prevented by control of the river catchments. Shows the co-ordinated program in the upper catchment areas and river control in the lower parts of the district. Commentary by Bill Beavis. Photography by George Hobbs.
